mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS postId, c.id, c.contents, c.rdate, c.stdn_id AS stdnId, s.name as stdnName, s.img as stdnImg FROM blah b JOIN comm c ON b.id = c.post_id JOIN stdn s ON c.stdn_id = s.id WHERE b.id = #{postId}
SELECT id, post_id AS postId, content, rdate, stdn_id AS stdnId FROM comm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comm (id, post_id, content, rdate, stdn_id) VALUES (comm_seq.NEXTVAL,#{postId},#{content},TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{stdnId})
